name: PTA Meeting
description: Come to the PTA meeting to hear what the PTA is up to and have a say! Find the agenda here!

name: Spelling Bee Finals
description: Congratulations to our finalists for earning a spot in the next round! Please come out and cheer them on.

name: Author Assembly - Shawn Harris
description: The PTA is hosting author Shawn Harris for an assembly for our students on the release of: Let's Be Bees. Order your very own book signed by Shawn Harris! The deadline to order books is Monday Jan 19th!

name: SPIRIT DAY: Wear a Sports Shirt
description: School spirit day to wear a sports shirt

name: Bubblefest
description: Bubblefest takes place in the cafeteria. We still need more volunteers to sign up, especially for setting up after school Thursday and cleaning up after the event on Friday.

name: School Site Council Meeting
description: School site council meeting

name: PTA Math Kangaroo
description: PTA math competition event

name: Winter recess (No School)
description: Winter recess

name: PTA General Meeting
description: PTA general meeting

name: Spring Pictures (Free Dress)
description: Spring school pictures, free dress day

name: Variety Show
description: We're gearing up for our upcoming Variety Show and need parent volunteers for MCs, Stage Hands, AV Support, and Concession Organizer. Audition Videos are due by Friday, March 6th, 2026. Dress Rehearsal is on Thursday, March 19th, 2026 at 4:00pm.

name: PTA Hicklebee's Book Fair
description: PTA book fair event

name: Elementary Minimum Days (Dismissed at 12:06pm)
description: Elementary minimum day, early dismissal

name: Martin Luther King Jr. Day
description: All Day

description: 100th day of school

name: Open House
description: School open house event

name: TK Tour
description: Transitional kindergarten tour for new families

description: School spirit day to wear crazy hats or hair

description: School spirit day to wear green

name: SPIRIT DAY: Dress as your favorite book character
description: School spirit day to dress as a book character

name: Four Seasons Fundraising Concert
description: Our community is invited to attend the Four Seasons Fundraising Concert at Venture Church, featuring the Castillero Middle School Orchestras and two-time Grammy-winning jazz violinist Mads Tolling.

name: Galentine's Night Out at F45 Branham Park
description: 45 minutes of strength training work out followed by bubbles. This is a free event with a maximum of 30 people, so sign up now! To sign up, text "LAMOMS" to 408.549.7760

name: Yearbook Cover Contest (5th Graders Only)
description: Entries due by February 23, 2026. Submit art on an 8.5 X 11 sheet of white paper, use the paper vertically. Include the theme "Under the Sea", the words "Los Alamitos", and the school year 2025-2026.

name: Math Kangaroo Competition
description: The Math Kangaroo competition is coming to Los Alamitos! Use the invitation code CASAN_J0017001@2026math to register.

name: Reading Lab Volunteers Needed
description: The Reading Lab is a tutoring program for students who would benefit from extra help with fundamental reading skills. We are looking for volunteers who can come in once per week (Tuesday, Wednesday, or Thursday).

name: Yearbook Orders
description: Last day to order the 2025–26 Yearbook is April 20th. 5th grade parents - start gathering those adorable baby photos for the 5th Grade Baby Pages! They are due by March 1st!
